description: This file defines an interface ILocalStore within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace for managing local data storage, including methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, querying entries, removing entries, and adding entries.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for a local storage system supporting table creation, entry management, and queries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table within the local store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range from a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves entries from a specified table starting at a position with a particular count.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds an entry to a specified table.
